channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 2024 US Open Is Designed to Thwart Golf’s Big Hitters
item.description: Players, aided by technology, are hitting the ball farther than ever, and courses can’t keep getting longer—meaning operators are having to find smart...

item.title: Aepnus wants to create a circular economy for key battery manufacturing materials
item.description: The specter of wastewater threatens to stall the construction of battery factories. One startup, though, says the solution isn’t to dispose of it, but...

item.title: If Ray Kurzweil Is Right (Again), You’ll Meet His Immortal Soul in the Cloud
item.description: The famed futurist remains inhumanly optimistic about the world and his own fate—and thinks the singularity is minutes away.

item.title: AccountsIQ takes in $65M to boost bookkeeping with AI

item.title: The Secret to Living Past 120 Years Old? Nanobots

item.title: Android’s long-time VP of engineering Dave Burke is stepping down
item.description: Android is losing one of its long-time engineering leads. Dave Burke, VP of engineering at Android, said on Thursday that he is stepping down from the...

item.title: Sellers Call Amazon’s Buy Box ‘Abusive.’ Now They’re Suing
item.description: UK retailers have accused Amazon of using its Buy Box section to choke their businesses, reigniting a years-long debate over whether there was foul pl...

item.title: Why being the last company to launch in a category can pay off
item.description: When Jordan Nathan launched his DTC nontoxic cookware company, Caraway, in 2019, he knew he was not the only founder trying to sell a new brand of pot...

item.title: Moment Warehouse Sale: Deals on Cameras, Lenses, and Accessories
item.description: Moment’s Warehouse Sale has deals on Wandrd camera bags, mobile lenses, and Instax cameras.

item.title: This humanoid robot can drive cars — sort of
item.description: Out of an abundance of caution, the car took two minutes to turn a corner. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
